content: inside out and turn your work for ease of knit- ting you ve been working the hat inside out from how it is intended to be worn now you ll complete the hat with the public side facing out you ll work one row back around to rejoin your work in the round slip first stitch where yarn is attached purlwise wyib k1 p1 k1 back to bor marker do not turn work begin decrease rounds round 1 sl1 pwise p2tog psso k1 around 44 sts rounds 2-4 p1 k1 around round 5 work as for decrease round 1 22 sts rounds 6-8 p1 k1 around round 9 k2tog around break yarn leaving a 12 tail and thread tail through remaining 11 sts to draw close finishing weave in ends on ws wet block and lay flat to dry 2 visit follow share visit us follow us share with us 740 winslow way east #thelambandkid bainbridge island wa @thelambandkid and www thelambandkid com the lamb & kid #tlkpebbleshat the lamb & kid pebbles hat version 1 // ©2022 the lamb & kid // all rights reserved for personal use only no portion of this pattern may be reproduced or distributed in any form or by any means without written permission
